metadata.title: CVE-2023-52876 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:clk: mediatek: clk-mt7629-eth: Add check for mtk_alloc_clk_dataAdd the check for the return value of mtk_alloc_clk_data() in order toavoid NULL pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
